block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Designated 1B-DH Mike Stanley for assignment. Optioned RHP John Wasdin and 1B-DH Morgan Burkhart to Pawtucket of the International League. Activated RHP Rod Beck from the disabled list. Called up 3B Sean Berry from Pawtucket of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Recalled RHP Erik Hiljus from Toledo of the International League. Optioned 1B Eric Munson to Jacksonville of the Southern League. MINNESOTA TWINS--Recalled LHP J.C. Romero from Salt Lake City of the PCL. Placed RHP Mike Lincoln on the 15-day disabled list.

National League CINCINNATI REDS--Activated RHP Manny Aybar from the 15-day disabled list. Agreed to terms with SS Barry Larkin on a three-year contract extension through 2003. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Activated OF Devon White from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Al Reyes to Albuquerque of the PCL. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Optioned RHP Mark Brownson to Scranton/Wilkes-Barre of the International League.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Designated 1B-DH Mike Stanley for assignment. Optioned RHP John Wasdin and 1B-DH Morgan Burkhart to Pawtucket of the International League. Activated RHP Rod Beck from the disabled list. Called up 3B Sean Berry from Pawtucket of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Recalled RHP Erik Hiljus from Toledo of the International League. Optioned 1B Eric Munson to Jacksonville of the Southern League. MINNESOTA TWINS--Recalled LHP J.C. Romero from Salt Lake City of the PCL. Placed RHP Mike Lincoln on the 15-day disabled list.

National League CINCINNATI REDS--Activated RHP Manny Aybar from the 15-day disabled list. Agreed to terms with SS Barry Larkin on a three-year contract extension through 2003. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Activated OF Devon White from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Al Reyes to Albuquerque of the PCL. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Optioned RHP Mark Brownson to Scranton/Wilkes-Barre of the International League.

National Football League CHICAGO BEARS--Signed S Mike Brown to a four-year contract. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed OT Barry Stokes. Waived P Scott Terna. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Signed CB Michael Swift. Released CB Isaac Harvin. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Signed RB J.R. Redmond to a four-year contract and LB Rob Holmberg. NEW YORK GIANTS--Placed CB Bashir Levingston, T Jim Goff, HB Cordell Mitchell and FB Brian Aikins on the physically unable to perform list. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Signed WR Sean Dawkins. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Signed OL Cosey Coleman to a four-year contract and TE Patrick Hape to a one-year contract. WASHINGTON REDSKINS--Signed RB Gerard Arnold. Waived WR Ethan Howell and LB Andre Reed.
